name: Base Configuration
description: Default AI formatting configuration for all projects
instructions: Read the entire codebase before providing suggestions
Consider the project structure and existing patterns
Maintain consistency with the current coding style
Explain your reasoning for any suggested changes
prompts: What is the overall architecture of this codebase?
What are the main components and their responsibilities?
Are there any code quality issues or potential improvements?
What are the key dependencies and their usage patterns?
Is the code following best practices for the language/framework?

small: Can you provide a brief overview of what this code does?
Are there any obvious bugs or improvements needed?
How would you rate the code quality and organization?
medium: What is the main functionality and how is it organized?
Are there any architectural patterns being used?
What would be the next logical features to implement?
Are there any performance or security considerations?
large: What are the core modules and their relationships?
How is the application structured and what are the main flows?
Are there opportunities for refactoring or modularization?
